BikeOMuter

Weather information for commuting by bike

Home Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions About

Description

BikeOMuter is an App, which provides weather information for the commute by bike . It helps to make the decision if you should go by bike or rather take the public transport.

Current Features:

  • evaluation of weather information to simplify decision making
  • daily weather information along a route (preferably by bike)
  • support for multiple bike routes
  • weather Information for the originating and the return trip

Future

I still have a lot of ideas how to improve BikeOMuter app, ranging from better UI/UX up to using Machine Learning algorithms for better weather evaluation.

Stay Tuned!
